Title: Investigate WLLS snapshot/materialize regression
Deliverable: DeviceRepository now hydrates shared cache snapshots automatically. 2025-11-28 pipeline + incremental checklist refreshed telemetry (SnapshotImported=3, InitNewStore=15, InitReuseStore=6, GetMiss=50/GetHit=24); WLLS AccessCacheHit=5/AccessRefresh=0; BOYO providers still Unknown; queue delay summary skipped (0 samples); PortBatchReady remains synthetic/minimal (1 sw1 batch) after dispatcher sweep (Logs/DispatchHarness/RoutingQueueSweep-checklist-20251128-095600.json). 2025-12-17: TelemetryModule now batches telemetry writes (flush-on ParseDuration/SkippedDuplicate) and ParserPersistenceModule reuses shared-cache entries to avoid redundant GetHit calls; Quick mock BOYO/WLLS pipeline now ~7s wall time with ParseDuration ~2.4s/0.35s and DatabaseWriteLatency ~290ms/99ms. 2025-12-20: Warm regression attempt failed the port batch diversity guard (WLLS streak 19 > limit 8); warm pass aborted. Artifacts: Logs/Reports/PortBatchSiteDiversity-2025-12-20.json, Logs/Reports/PortBatchReady-2025-12-20.json, Logs/Reports/InterfaceSyncTiming-2025-12-20.json. 2025-12-20: Warm regression rerun with -SkipPortDiversityGuard completed the cold pass but failed in Invoke-WarmRunTelemetry.ps1 (Collect-TelemetryForPass missing Count property); warm pass aborted and no WarmRunTelemetry emitted. Artifacts: Logs/Reports/PortBatchReady-2025-12-20.json, Logs/Reports/InterfaceSyncTiming-2025-12-20.json, Logs/Reports/ParserSchedulerLaunch-2025-12-20.json. 2025-12-21: Warm regression rerun with -SkipPortDiversityGuard completed cold+warm passes but failed warm-run validation (157 hosts without SiteCacheProvider=Cache; 37 hosts without HostMapSignatureMatchCount; rewrote 1,440 cached host entries). No WarmRunTelemetry emitted; queue delay summary missing (0 samples). Artifacts: Logs/IngestionMetrics/2025-12-21.json, Logs/Reports/PortBatchReady-2025-12-21.json, Logs/Reports/InterfaceSyncTiming-2025-12-21.json, Logs/Reports/ParserSchedulerLaunch-2025-12-21.json, Logs/SharedCacheSnapshot/SharedCacheSnapshot-20251221-070128.clixml. 2025-12-20: Warm regression rerun after telemetry fixes completed warm pass but failed warm-run validation (missing DatabaseWriteBreakdown/InterfaceSyncTiming; 37 hosts without SiteCacheProvider=Cache; 1 host missing HostMapSignatureMatchCount; rewrote 168 cached host entries). No WarmRunTelemetry emitted. Artifacts: Logs/Reports/PortBatchReady-2025-12-20.json, Logs/Reports/InterfaceSyncTiming-2025-12-20.json, Logs/Reports/ParserSchedulerLaunch-2025-12-20.json, Logs/IngestionMetrics/QueueDelaySummary-2025-12-20.json, Logs/SharedCacheSnapshot/SharedCacheSnapshot-20251220-230155.clixml, Logs/SharedCacheSnapshot/SharedCacheSnapshot-20251220-230430.clixml. 2025-12-20: Expanded mock corpus (routing host list clones) + interface dispatch harness flushed queue metrics; queue delay summary now passes (SampleCount=8, QueueBuildDelay p95=12.43 ms / p99=16.65 ms). PortBatchReady report reflects 35 hosts; updated snapshot Logs/SharedCacheSnapshot/SharedCacheSnapshot-20251220-144919.clixml and queue summary Logs/IngestionMetrics/QueueDelaySummary-2025-12-20.json. 2025-12-20: Site-cache materialization skips template lookup when PortColor/ConfigStatus already set; diag pipeline on BOYO/WLLS logs SnapshotImported=4, GetMiss=96/GetHit=2 (Logs/IngestionMetrics/2025-12-20.json, Logs/SharedCacheSnapshot/SharedCacheSnapshot-20251220-135800.clixml).
Notes: Next: analyze warm pass cache misses (157 non-Cache, 37 signature misses) and rerun warm regression with -SkipWarmValidation to export WarmRunTelemetry; run provider-reason diagnostics against Logs/IngestionMetrics/2025-12-21.json.
